Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Navigation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class containing all robot movement related behaviors. Extends Thread.
    Author:
    Volen Mihaylov, Patrick Ghazal, Bryan Jay
